title: Science Domain Job English Competency Enhancement via Mobile Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-Level Science Vocabulary Comprehension and Basic Digital Tool Proficiency
context.additional_context: Building collaborative learning environments for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields using mobile devices and Web 2.0 tools

learning_goals: Learners enhance their English communication skills in the science field through collaborative task performance with peers using mobile devices.
Learners autonomously conduct science paper summarization and discussion activities using Web 2.0 tools (e.g., Padlet, Google Docs).
Learners cultivate practical skills to apply science-specific terminology contextually through mobile-assisted learning tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
